item.title: [GRA5/GRA7/GRA9/GRA11/SBG5/WAW1/BHS5/DE1/UK1][Containers & Orchestration] - Managed Kubernetes Service update

Feb 23, 16:01 UTC

End time : 28/02/2024 17:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : : This maintenance is scheduled to upgrade all clusters with a policy update configured by the customer to ALWAYS UPDATE (through the API Ovhcloud console) or to MAXIMUM SECURITY (through the Manager UI interface).
With this maintenance, we will upgrade all concerned MKS services to the latest patch version provided by our team. For more details, please refer to the documentation

item.title: [uk1] API incident
item.description:
Feb 15, 10:38 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Feb 15, 09:29 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing disruption on region uk1.
Impact can be experienced on the API.

It is advised currently to avoid actions such as rebooting and rebuilding instances.
Currently, running instances are not impacted.

Our engineers are working to resolve the situation.
Furthermore details will be provided as soon as possible.

item.title: [GRA7][Public cloud] - API unreachable
item.description:
Feb 8, 13:41 UTC
Resolved - Start time :08/02/2024 11:23 UTC
End time : 08/02/2024 13:34 UTC
Root cause : Software issue.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Feb 8, 12:32 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 08/02/2024 11:23 UTC
Service impact : The GRA7 region API is inaccessible, so customers may not be able to perform actions such as reboot, shutdown or backup, but they will still be able to access the instances.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
